thread.title: Linda Wojcik, Ontario, Canada
thread.title_full: HablaCuba.com reviewed by Linda Wojcik, Ontario, Canada

author: Linda Wojcik, Ontario, Canada
title: Linda Wojcik, Ontario, Canada
text:
We have been using HablaCuba.com for 4 years now and are very satisfied with their services. They make it very easy to buy credits for Cubacel, so that we can keep in touch with our Cuban friends.
Thank-you HablaCuba!
The Wojcik Family,
Hamilton, Ontario
Canada
